name: Run Turtle, Run! (Boombott, Viston, InnerMask)
description:
Oh no! You've only just hatched and you're already being attacked by dangerous predators! Quickly, make your way to the sea and swim your way to safety! 

Made for the "I can't draw but I want to make a game again" jam. 

Controls:

Arrow Keys (Or WASD) = Move the Turtle

Z = Shoot

Shift = Hold for Slow Speed
